lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "There are a variety of contingencies and restricted cash, and all sorts of things that make it very speculative," said one of the sources, adding there are also severance payments to employees.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Today, Purolator revealed in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission that director Doresy Gardner resigned from its board of directors in a letter dated March 10.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "It's a very complex transaction, but basically what happens is they ostensibly put up money but the fees recapture any investment they might have once the merger takes place," Gardner said.
